com.yworks.yfiles.graph.styles

Class PolylineEdgeStyle

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yworks.yfiles.graph.styles.PolylineEdgeStyle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IArrowOwner, IEdgeStyle, ICloneable, Cloneable

    public class PolylineEdgeStyle
extends Object
implements IEdgeStyle, IArrowOwner, Cloneable
    A polygonal IEdgeStyle where straight line segments are used to connect the bends.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PolylineEdgeStyle()
      Creates a new instance using PolylineEdgeStyleRenderer as renderer.
      PolylineEdgeStyle(PolylineEdgeStyleRenderer renderer)
      Creates a new instance using the provided renderer.

      • getSmoothingLength

        public final double getSmoothingLength()
        Gets the smoothing length used for creating smooth bends.

        A value of 0.0d will disable smoothing.

        The default value is 0.

        Returns:
        The SmoothingLength.
        See Also:
        setSmoothingLength(double)

      • getSourceArrow

        public final IArrow getSourceArrow()
        Gets the visual arrow at the source end of edges that use this style.

        Arrow instances may be shared between multiple style instances.

        This property may not be null. To have no source arrow set, use IArrow.NONE instead.

        The default value is IArrow.NONE.

        Specified by:
        getSourceArrow in interface IArrowOwner
        Returns:
        The SourceArrow.
        See Also:
        setSourceArrow(IArrow)

      • getTargetArrow

        public final IArrow getTargetArrow()
        Gets the visual arrow at the target end of edges that use this style.

        Arrow instances may be shared between multiple style instances.

        This property may not be null. To have no target arrow set, use IArrow.NONE instead.

        The default value is IArrow.NONE.

        Specified by:
        getTargetArrow in interface IArrowOwner
        Returns:
        The TargetArrow.
        See Also:
        setTargetArrow(IArrow)
